channel.title: Commands?
channel.description:
wtf hwne i try to attack a monster i have this in double why? :
[img]http://img107.imageshack.us/img107/4778/bughe9.png[/img]
And when i try attack player in wild i got this :
[img]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1413/bug2dg8.png[/img]
can you help me plz i dont want "Attack" in double and other

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Zaikill Zaikill
item.description:
@Zaikill wrote:

nope i have put your code and i got :
Colored : Attack
White : Attack

why the second attack stay here ><

does it in my private client ?

Read full topic

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @X_Da_Master_X X Da Master X
item.description:
@X_Da_Master_X wrote:

This is my code for right click on a Player:

[code]
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString(
“@whi@T@gre@r@whi@a@gre@d@whi@e @whi@w@gre@i@whi@t@gre@h”);
outStream.endFrameVarSize();

        if (playerRights <= 2) {
            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(2); // command slot
            outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
            outStream.writeString("@whi@F@gre@o@whi@l@gre@l@whi@o@gre@w");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();
        } 

        outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
        outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
        outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
        outStream.writeString("@whi@A@gre@t@whi@t@gre@a@whi@c@gre@k");
        outStream.endFrameVarSize();
        IsInWilderness = true;

        if (playerRights > 0 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Da Master")) {		
            outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
            outStream.writeByteC(5); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
            outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
            outStream.writeString("@whi@K@gre@i@whi@c@gre@k");
            outStream.endFrameVarSize();
        }[/code]

I think you have 2 attack so delete 1.
Normal that problem is fixed now.

But for the Npc i don’t know (are u sure its 1 Ice giant and not 2 at the same place :P)

Read full topic
